ARABIC: فَتَوَلَّىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ فَجَمَعَ كَيْدَهُۥ ثُمَّ أَتَىٰ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So Pharaoh went away and concocted his scheme and then he arrived.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: After this the Pharaoh withdrew and settled his stratagem, then came back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Pharaoh went back and concerted all his stratagem and returned for the encounter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Pharaoh returned to organize his plans and then attended the appointment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So Firaun went away and gathered his schemes,* then came. (* 72000 magicians and their materials.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So Fir`awn withdrew, devised his plot and then came back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So Firon turned his back and settled his plan, then came.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Pharaoh then withdrew, and gathered his guile. Thereafter he came again,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then Pharaoh went and gathered his strength, then came (to the appointed tryst).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So Pharaoh withdrew, devised his stratagem and returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then Firawn turned away, devised his stratagem; thereafter he came.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then Pharaoh withdrew [to consult privately], summoned up his guile, and then arrived [at the scene of the contest].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So Pharaoh withdrew: He concerted his plan, and then came (back).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So Fir'aun (Pharaoh) withdrew, devised his plot and then came back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So Pharaoh withdrew and gathered his guile, then returned,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Pharaoh turned away, put together his plan, and then came back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So Pharaoh went away, put together his plan, and then came [to Moses].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:60] Then Pharaoh withdrew, retreated, and summoned up his guile, that is to say, those [human] elements of his guile from among the sorcerers, and then came, with them to the tryst.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then Pharaoh went) to his folk (and gathered his strength) he gathered his advisers and magicians who were 72 in number (and came (to the appointed tryst)) to the appointed time of the gathering.
